title: [Deleted] {Client Crash} Sometimes when I click to go loot menu and top right corner it crashes.
body:
topic.

re made post as it was deleted for some reason.

replies.body: I don't have the game bar enabled. I do have windows 10. I am also fully updated on windows.

This is an issue we're aware of and are looking at finding a fix for. In the meantime, you can try updating Windows to see if it resolves the problem as it has for some players. If you're running windows 10 though, you may need to [disable the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) after updating since it's causing FPS issues for some.

Let me know if you have any questions.
